name: Shelikhoo (V2Fly, Way To Fly)
cooked:
We have recently created a version of Tor Browser with supported_groups patch countermeasure applied to Snowflake to evade a kind of censorship currently observed in Russia.

You can download it from here: Index of /~shelikhoo/dqo8apcai4/tor-browser (Source: use patched dtls lib (9d73998b) · Commits · shelikhoo / tor-browser-build · GitLab)

If you have experienced snowflake interruption in Russia, please let us know whether you experienced a change in connectivity.

link_counts.title: IRC Tip about Signature used to block Snowflake in Russia, 2022-May-16 (#40030) · Issues · The Tor Project / Anti-censorship / censorship-analysis · GitLab
Shuffle Elliptic Curves in ClientHello to circumvent Russian censorship by ValdikSS · Pull Request #474 · pion/dtls · GitHub
use patched dtls lib (9d73998b) · Commits · shelikhoo / tor-browser-build · GitLab
In case Snowflake rendezvous gets blocked

cooked:
Mirror of the files at archive.org:

Internet Archive

Tor Browser 11.5a13 snowflake-dtlslib-20220712-9d73998bca39 : The Tor Project...

A custom build of Tor Browser 11.5a13 with a tweaked DTLS fingerprint for Snowflake. TorBrowser-11.5a13-osx64_en-US.dmg...

link_counts.title: Tor Browser 11.5a13 snowflake-dtlslib-20220712-9d73998bca39 : The Tor Project : Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming : Internet Archive
Internet Archive: Digital Library of Free & Borrowable Books, Movies, Music & Wayback Machine

cooked:

Mobile ISP.

snowflake: offer created
snowflake: broker rendezvous peer received
snowflake: connection failed timeout waiting for DataChannel.OnOpen

Regular (non-patched) Snowflake works fine on 4 of my ISPs.

Elevator:

Megafon St. Petersburg

Is that a mobile or a landline?

Yota, Novosibirsk. As far as I know, Yota uses Megafon towers.

name: anonymous57
cooked: PoC for test purpose. (browsers/pions = 1/15)
